keys: Ciencias de la Agricultura. Hoja de consejos
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4329</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Organic Farming - Reference</string>
            <string language="es">Agricultura orgánica - Referencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Feirmeoireacht Orgánach - Tagairt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisches Bewirtschaften - Referenz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Agriculture Biologique - Référence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultivar Orgânico - Referência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Agricoltura Biologica - Riferimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργανική καλλιέργεια - αναφορά</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An overview of Organic Farming written by Dr. Trevor Storey - written for the                           IASTA Conference in UCD, March 1999. Dr. Storey lectures with the                           Department of Crop Science, Horticulture and Forestry, U.C.D. Belfield, Dublin                           4.</string>
            <string language="es">Una visión general de Agricultura orgánica escrita por Dr. Trevor Storey – para la                           Conferencia IASTA en UCD, marzo 1999. El Dr. Storey imparte clases en el                           Departamento de Ciencias de Cultivos agrícolas,</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbhreathnú ar Fheirmeoireacht Orgánach a scríobh an Dr Treor Storey le Roinn na hEolaíochta Bairr, Gairneoireachta agu Foraoiseacht, U.C.D., Belfield, BÁC 4.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Agricultural Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias de la Agricultura. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht Talmhaíochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Überblick über das organische 
Bewirtschaften geschrieben vom Dr. Trevor Storey - geschrieben für 
die IASTA Konferenz in UCD, März 1999. Dr. Storey konferiert 
mit der Abteilung der Getreide-Wissenschaft, des Gartenbaus und der 
Forstwirtschaft, U.C.D. Belfield, Dublin 4.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une vue d'ensemble de l'agriculture biologique 
écrite par Dr. Trevor Storey - écrit pour la conférence d'IASTA 
dans UCD, mars 1999. Dr. Storey parle avec le service de la 
Science de collecte, de l'horticulture et de la sylviculture, U.C.D. 
Belfield, Dublin 4.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma vista geral de cultivar orgânico escrita 
pelo Dr. Trevor Storey - escrito para a conferência em UCD, março 
1999 de IASTA. O Dr. Storey lectures com o departamento da 
ciência da colheita, do horticulture e do forestry, U.C.D. 
Belfield, Dublin 4.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una descrizione di agricoltura biologica scritta 
dal Dott. Trevor Storey - scritto per il congresso in UCD, marzo del 
1999 di IASTA. Il Dott. Storey parla con il reparto della 
scienza del raccolto, dell'orticoltura e della silvicoltura, U.C.D. 
Belfield, Dublino 4.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επισκόπηση της οργανικής καλλιέργειας που γράφεται
από το Δρ Trevor Storey - που γράφεται για τη διάσκεψη 
IASTA σε UCD, 1999, Μαρτίου ο Δρ Storey μιλά με το 
τμήμα επιστήμης συγκομιδών, δενδροκηποκομίας και δασονομίας, 
U.C.D. Belfield, Δουβλίνο 4.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Agrarwissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Science Agronomique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência Agricultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza Agricola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωργική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
